__e: I didn't deserve it, what you did the other day, but... thank you.
Well, it sounded like she deserved what happened to her, and I don't believe that.
He deserved what will happen to him, but it did not seem right.
I know what you must think that I deserved this.
But we haven't earned that yet -- not in this relationship, anyway.
No matter how angry I am, you don't deserve this.
Well, after everything you've been through these past couple of weeks, I'd say you've earned someplace warm.
And by the way, I feel like I've earned a little respect, too.
But, you know, there's, there's... there's someone here who really deserved an award tonight and didn't get one.
And maybe... Just maybe... I've earned the right to live a little before I die.
I think that means I've earned the right... to at least look him in the eye... and tell him that he didn't beat me, he doesn't get to win.
About that... what in the hell is wrong with you telling Lucas he never deserved the name Scott?
If they deserved to die, I'm sure you could do it.
I mean, this is a party for you guys as much as anybody, right?
"I have a mother who doesn't deserve to see me in jail.
Well, then I'd say we're due for a break, wouldn't you?
I suppose I should thank you for... giving me a second chance at life, but... I'm not even sure I deserved a first.
Just between us bad guys... has anyone ever... earned their way out?
